segments.text: Excuse me , I'm looking for your English textbooks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're right over there , next to the dictionaries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any textbooks to help improve students ' reading skills ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ' s see . These books here focus on grammar , and those are mainly for conversation practice ... Here we are . This book has short passages for students to read and answer questions about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . That ' s just the sort of thing I'm looking for . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
